title: Israel Arrests Senior Hamas Official for Inciting Terrorism
text:
JERUSALEMâ€”Israel arrested a senior Hamas official in the West Bank on Tuesday and accused him of inciting terrorism against Israeli citizens, the day after Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu lashed out at Hamas leaders he said were encouraging Palestinians to attack Israelis.
The Israeli military detained Hassan Yousef in a predawn raid in... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
